testcase.classname: user should be able to register
testcase.name: user register successfully
user login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: When user click on login button.............................................passed And user enter "automation2@gmail.com" and "P@ssw0rd".......................passed Then user could login successfully..........................................passed

testcase.classname: guest user could switch between currencies [$, €]
testcase.name: user could select euro
testcase.system-out: When user choose euro currency..............................................passed Then euro selected successfully.............................................passed

testcase.classname: users will be able to search for products with different parameters

testcase.system-out: When click on search field in home page.....................................passed And search for product "Apple"..............................................passed Then search result appear successfully......................................passed

testcase.classname: users will be able to search for products with different parameters

testcase.system-out: When click on search field in home page.....................................passed And search for product "AP_MBP_13"..........................................passed Then search result appear successfully......................................passed

testcase.classname: user could hover categories and select sub category

testcase.system-out: When user hover category and select subcategory.............................passed Then subcategory page open successfully.....................................passed
